summary: Sergio, Fausto Diego and Claudio have to struggle against Camorra in order to open an agritourism.
cast: Luca Argentero|Edoardo Leo|Anna Foglietta|Claudio Amendola|Stefano Fresi|Carlo Buccirosso|Rufin Doh Zeyenouin|Mattia Sbragia|Apetor Afiwayi|Georgia Lepore|Carmine Battaglia|Walter Nicoletti|Gualtiero Burzi|Roberta Carrese|Federico Torre|Carmine Monaco|Rolando Ravello
title: Noi e la Giulia
